article.title: A Survey of Structure from Motion

choices: The problem of structure from motion.

multiple_choice_question.text: Which of the following components is NOT depicted in Figure 2?
What does the cost function in Formula (1) aim to minimize?
choices: The difference between the estimated and true camera orientations.
The discrepancy between measured image points and their projections based on estimated camera parameters and 3D structure.
The number of outlier feature matches.

multiple_choice_question.text: What important geometric relationship does Formula (2) represent?
choices: The projection of a 3D point onto an image plane using the pinhole camera model.
The coplanarity constraint between a 3D point and the camera centers.
The orthographic projection of a 3D point.
The minimization of reprojection error in bundle adjustment.
